46b632d0-de68-4d51-ab8b-cbc06a14383f.description: Individuals who have earned this badge have completed the Self Leadership Online Collaborative Course. They have demonstrated the mindset and skillset of a proactive self-starter and took control of their own development. They have increased personal accountability by overcoming constraints that limit their ability to solve problems, assessed competence and commitment on a specific goal or task and asked for the direction and support they need to attain mastery faster.
46b632d0-de68-4d51-ab8b-cbc06a14383f.name: Blanchard Certified Self Leader

issuer.summary: issued by The Ken Blanchard Companies

badge_template_activities.title: Completed 12+ hours of learning activities (formal learning, in-platform discussions and application) in the Self Leadership Online Collaborative Course
Completed the mission and field reports for each week, including the Action Plan and video attestation
Attended and/or viewed all 6 recordings of all live INSPIRE sessions

4d9b11cf-e0e2-4ed9-b96d-ed8b20476b0c.description: Individuals who earn this badge completed the UNLEASH Management Development Program that is comprised of three components: 1. Blanchard SLII® (online instructor-led), including all modules of the program: Goal Setting, Diagnosing Development Level, and Matching Leadership Styles; 2. Building trust overview; 3. Leading and managing virtual teams.
4d9b11cf-e0e2-4ed9-b96d-ed8b20476b0c.name: UNLEASH Management Development Program

issuer.summary: issued by The Ken Blanchard Companies

badge_template_activities.title: Completed the 2 day UNLEASH Management Development Program

9d2a29fa-6ed4-47a4-90c9-33e6bbf52f5a.description: An organization that has earned this credential is a formally authorized, approved and active Licensee (‘Channel Partner’) of The Ken Blanchard Companies.

a7a754fa-d4ca-4a4e-989c-ef0ec0e389d7.description: Individuals who earn this badge completed the Blanchard Student Self Leadership Collaborative Online. The 6-week class covers how to become an empowered self leader, someone who knows how to ask for help and feedback to take charge of their goals. Led by a leadership expert who acts as a coach, the class is designed to help high school students take responsibility, communicate better, gain confidence, and set clear goals.
a7a754fa-d4ca-4a4e-989c-ef0ec0e389d7.name: Blanchard Student Self Leader

issuer.summary: issued by The Ken Blanchard Companies

badge_template_activities.title: Completed 12+ hours of learning activities in the Student Self Leadership Collaborative Online Course consisting of formal learning and in-platform application work
Completed a self-assessment at the beginning and end of class to determine knowledge, skills, and confidence in implementing the self leadership mindsets and skillsets
Attended and/or viewed recordings of all 6 live INSPIRE sessions including participation in large and small-group activities
Completed the self-study content, at-home activities, missions, and discussion questions for each week

Submitted assignments that describe: how you have flipped a limiting belief; skills or personal characteristics that enable you to influence outcomes or people; what you do in your life without being told; goals and dreams you have in the short or long term; examples of when you have been at different development levels: beginning, struggling, building confidence, and able to teach others; how to ask for what you need to be successful on a task; and a thank you to someone who has influenced you

skills.name: Asking for the Right Amount of Direction and Support

e21ccc56-827b-46a7-a03a-73fb5c505086.description: Individuals who have earned this credential have completed the Conversational Capacity Collaborative Online Program. They have demonstrated the key concepts and skillset behind balancing candor and curiosity to find the sweet spot in difficult conversations. They’ve learned their natural tendency to minimize or win and how to recognize the triggers that set off those tendencies. They have acquired the learning-focused mindset needed to react in a balanced and intentional way—even under pressure.
e21ccc56-827b-46a7-a03a-73fb5c505086.name: Blanchard Certified Conversational Capacity

issuer.summary: issued by The Ken Blanchard Companies

badge_template_activities.title: Completed 10-12+ hours of learning activities (formal learning, in-platform discussions and application) in the Conversational Capacity Collaborative Online Program.
Completed the mission and field reports for each week, including the Action Plan and video attestation.
Attended and/or viewed all 5 recordings of all live INSPIRE sessions.

skills.name: Reacting In A Balanced Way Under Pressure

c402847a-6a1b-48b4-90bd-a0c3dab67457.description: Individuals who earned this badge completed the Blanchard SLII® program, including: Goal Setting, Diagnosing Development Level, and Matching Leadership Styles. They demonstrated knowledge transfer in each of these SLII skills through practice activities. They discovered their leadership style and demonstrated knowledge transfer in developing clear and compelling goals, diagnosing competence and commitment of an individual for a goal/task, and using directive and supportive leadership styles.
c402847a-6a1b-48b4-90bd-a0c3dab67457.name: SLII Collaborative Online

issuer.summary: issued by The Ken Blanchard Companies

badge_template_activities.title: Completed the five-week Blanchard SLII® Collaborative Online program including weekly virtual facilitator-led debrief sessions, collaboration with a cohort of their peers, guided on-the-job application activities, and a capstone project.

Completed multiple assessments, including a self-assessment that led them to discover their natural leadership strengths and learning opportunities, as well as assessments that demonstrated their understanding of critical SLII skillsets.

Demonstrated application of the critical concepts and skills of SLII through a capstone project that provides the foundation for their journey to mastery using SLII on the job with a direct report or team member.
Accessed and used tools to sustain and support continuous learning, including continued access to the Blanchard SLII app and Kenbot - portable online tools that provide just in time learning.

skills.name: Applying A Situational Approach To Leadership

b073933a-d9cf-40bb-bc3d-bac6a32a60c3.description: Individuals who earn this badge completed the Adult Mentor version of the Blanchard Student Self Leadership Collaborative Online. The 6-week class covers how to support young people in your life so that they can become empowered self leaders. With three live sessions with Blanchard’s leadership experts as well as self-study material, the class provides a common language between adults and student self leaders so that they can become more self-reliant and have better conversations more often.
b073933a-d9cf-40bb-bc3d-bac6a32a60c3.name: Blanchard Student Self Leader Champion

issuer.summary: issued by The Ken Blanchard Companies

badge_template_activities.title: Completed 16+ hours of learning activities in the Student Self Leadership Collaborative Online Course consisting of formal learning and in-platform application work
Completed several self-assessments to evaluate natural leadership tendencies as well as knowledge, skills, and confidence in implementing the self leadership mindsets and skillsets
Attended and/or viewed recordings of all 3 live CHAMPION sessions including participation in large and small-group activities
Completed the self-study content, at-home activities, missions, and discussion questions for each week

Submitted assignments that describe: your mentor mission statement; applying Communication Essentials skills; how you have flipped a limiting belief; putting Build Trust principles into action; embracing new mindsets for Adapting to Change; examples of when you have been at different development levels: beginning, struggling, building confidence, and able to teach others; specific ways to help youth become more self-reliant; and skills that enable you to influence outcomes or people.

skills.name: Providing the Right Amount of Direction and Support

611e74ea-ae0f-4324-a05f-4719ffd4d8a9.description: Individuals who have earned this badge completed the Courageous Inclusion Facilitator Training and are Blanchard qualified to deliver this program. They acknowledge that we all have more to learn about ourselves, people's experiences, and the world around us. They spent additional time reflecting on their own points of privilege, the journey toward advocacy on personal issues, and the facilitator's role in creating a safe and inclusive environment for this important and sensitive topic.
611e74ea-ae0f-4324-a05f-4719ffd4d8a9.name: Courageous Inclusion Facilitator

issuer.summary: issued by The Ken Blanchard Companies

badge_template_activities.title: As a pre-requisite to the facilitator session, all individuals have to take Courageous Inclusion in either the face-to-face or VILT version as a participant.

Following the Courageous Inclusion program, facilitators who wish to be qualified can take the 2.5 hour session that allows them to acquire and apply knowledge. Prior to the session, they write their own DEI story, which they workshop during the session. Post-workshop, they create a video that models their courageous inclusion skills in response to a scenario that is provided to them.
